tests.name: CSV content test - consistent birth_month
tests.run: awk -F, 'NR>1 && !($1 ~ /^(January|February|March|April|May|June|July|August|September|October|November|December)$/) {exit 1; print "Inconsistent month name found in birth_month column" >> error_messages.md}' form_cleaned.csv

tests.name: CSV content test - no null ages
tests.run: awk -F, 'NR>1 && ($2 == "" || $2 == " ") {exit 1; print "Null value found in age column" >> error_messages.md}' form_cleaned.csv

tests.name: CSV content test - no null campus
tests.run: awk -F, 'NR>1 && ($3 == "" || $2 == " ") {exit 1; print "Null value found in campus column" >> error_messages.md}' form_cleaned.csv

tests.name: CSV content test - consistent campus
tests.run: awk -F, 'NR>1 && !($3 ~ /^(Bangor|Newtownards|Lisburn|Downpatrick)$/) {exit 1; print "Inconsistent campus name found in campus column" >> error_messages.md}' form_cleaned.csv

tests.name: CSV content test - at least 17 rows
tests.run: awk 'END {if (NR < 18) {exit 1; print "form_cleaned.csv does not have enough rows. Too many removed." >> error_messages.md}}' form_cleaned.csv
